p: The purpose of this study was to reduce the complications of menopause and post‐ovarian problems in women. Ovariectomy is well known to decreased oestrogen hormones, calcium metabolism, bone mineral content, endometrial and lumen weight and volume. These diverse effects could also result in bone fracture tissue called osteoporosis (Lello et al., 2018; Sattar, 2016; Taylor et al., 2019). The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approved OVX rat model to study menopause, postmenopausal osteoporosis and the possible natural and synthetic therapeutic agents (Johnston & Ward, 2015).
